metadata.titel_preek: Schätze im Himmel, Schätze auf Erden

primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The human subject must activate their innate 'inner light' (perception/truth-capacity) to overcome the darkness of capitalism and militarism to create a new earth.

tekstueel_bewijs: Das Licht, das in dir ist
Licht ist ein Symbol für Gott

ontvanger.identificatie: The Poor / The World / The Self
tekstueel_bewijs: ein Verbrechen ist an den Armen
unser ganzer Leib voll Licht sein
Das Auge ist das Organ, mit dem wir wahrnehmen
Jesus sagt uns hier, dass wir wahrheitsfähig sind
helper.rol_van_god: God is reduced to a symbol for the inner light (Helper/Source), not the active Subject.

tekstueel_bewijs: Wirtschaftssystem, das auf der Unterdrückung der Armen beruht
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is systemic and psychological (repression), but can be overcome by human 'seeing' and 'acting'.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: There is no distinct soteriological program where God acts upon the human; the ethical program is the only program.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: n/a

actantieel_schema_visualisatie.zender_naar_ontvanger: Inner Light → Ethical Integrity → The Poor
actantieel_schema_visualisatie.subject_naar_object: The Human → Creating a New Earth

voorbeelden_god_subject: als Gott Licht und Finsternis trennte (historical reference)
voorbeelden_mens_subject: Wir sind beteiligt daran, eine neue Erde zu schaffen
Ich gehe mit Bibeltexten so um...

voorbeelden: Ihr könnt nicht Gott dienen und dem Kapital
wir lernen müssen, unser Leben als einen Krieg zu begreifen

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon assumes that 'Knowing/Seeing' (Savoir) automatically grants the 'Ability' (Pouvoir) to act. It is a Gnostic-leaning moralism.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: From S2 (Darkness of system) through ~S1 (Repression) to ~S2 (Enlightenment) and finally S1 (The Human as Light).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: Resolution is achieved through human cognitive awakening ('Wahrheitsfähigkeit').
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: S2 is seen as a political/economic choice, not an ontological condition of sin requiring divine intervention.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon is anthropocentric. God is a symbol or a passive source of an 'inner light' that humans already possess. The human is the primary actor (Subject) of salvation/transformation.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: Wir sind beteiligt daran, eine neue Erde zu schaffen.
Licht ist ein Symbol für Gott. Wenn nun Gott, der in dir ist...

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: The 'Military Advisor' and 'The Child' serve as models of the 'enlightened eye' that the hearer should emulate.
bijbelse_figuren_als_model: Jesus (as a teacher of economic truth)
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: God opens the eyes of the blind (Christ as Subject) because we are naturally in darkness.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Empowerment through self-actualization; burden of 'creating a new earth'.
identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Pelagianism: The human has the natural capacity to see and do the good without special grace.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: Highly coherent as a political-ethical manifesto, but incoherent as a Christian sermon because the Gospel (God's action) is absent.
spanning_punten: The tension between 'God as Light' and 'Light as human capacity'.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: Jesus provides the insight (enlightenment) that triggers human action.

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The sermon assumes innate competence ('Wahrheitsfähigkeit') rather than a gift of the Spirit.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Sin is 'Verdrängung' (repression) and 'Habsucht' (greed), treated as a correctable lack of perception.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The human is the Subject; God is the Object/Symbol. The narrative engine is human enlightenment.

subject_herpositionering.voorgestelde_herpositionering: God must be the one who gives sight to the blind.
subject_herpositionering.voorbeeld_revisie: Gott öffnet uns die Augen, damit wir die Not der Armen nicht länger übersehen.

identificatie_herstel.strategie: Position the hearer as the one sitting in darkness who receives light from Christ.

modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: Emphasize that we *cannot* see on our own due to the power of Mammon.

tegenstander_intensivering.voorgestelde_intensivering: Sin as a power that binds the will.
tegenstander_intensivering.theologische_rationale: If the opponent is just a 'wrong system', we don't need a Savior, just a better politician.

narratieve_hierarchie_herstel.probleem: Ethics exists without a prior Soteriology.
narratieve_hierarchie_herstel.voorgestelde_structuur: 1. God rescues us from the power of Mammon. 2. Therefore, we are free to serve the poor.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: The sermon is a powerful political call to action, but structurally it functions as Law without Gospel, placing the burden of 'creating a new earth' entirely on human 'truth-capacity'.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: Rhetorically, it is persuasive and uses 'mystical' language; actantially, it is purely anthropocentric.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis is used to support a pre-existing political-economic framework rather than letting the text's own Subject (God) speak.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Greimas reveals that despite the word 'Gott', the functional role of God is a 'dead value' (Sender) rather than a 'living agent' (Subject).

appendices.notities: The sermon exhibits 'Synergism' at best and 'Pelagianism' at worst.
